channel.title: Spupid News
channel.description:
Post loads of random, weird, disturbing news here (got to be real)
-A Sudanese man has been forced to take a goat as his "wife" Link: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/africa/4748292.stm
-Toxic waste creates hermaphrodite Arctic polar bears Link: http://news.independent.co.uk/environment/article337581.ece
-MAN DATES GAL ON INTERNET FOR SIX MONTHS -- AND IT TURNS OUT SHE'S HIS MOTHER! Link: http://entertainment.tv.yahoo.com/news/wwn/20051209/113414040002.html
-Guy Stabbed Several Times Drives Home to Call 911 So His Car Doesn't Get Towed Link: http://www.thekansascitychannel.com/news/5015728/detail.html
-Flaming Mouse Torches House Link: http://cbs4boston.com/watercooler/watercooler_story_009092909.html
